-- Using Corrosion as a subdirectory
CMake Error at build/_deps/redis-plus-plus-src/CMakeLists.txt:1 (cmake_minimum_required):
  Compatibility with CMake < 3.5 has been removed from CMake.

  Update the VERSION argument <min> value.  Or, use the <min>...<max> syntax
  to tell CMake that the project requires at least <min> but has been updated
  to work with policies introduced by <max> or earlier.

  Or, add -DCMAKE_POLICY_VERSION_MINIMUM=3.5 to try configuring anyway.

I already fixed this for one of the other projects in vendor/, though I can't remember which one

     5→    file(STRINGS "src/sw/redis++/version.h" VERSION_INFO REGEX "${VERSION_REGEX}")

file.content:
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.1)

function(GET_VERSION VERSION_PART VERSION_NUM)
    set(VERSION_REGEX "^const int VERSION_${VERSION_PART} = (.+);$")
    file(STRINGS "src/sw/redis++/version.h" VERSION_INFO REGEX "${VERSION_REGEX}")
    string(REGEX REPLACE "${VERSION_REGEX}" "\\1" VERSION_RESULT ${VERSION_INFO})
    set(${VERSION_NUM} ${VERSION_RESULT} PARENT_SCOPE)
endfunction()

GET_VERSION("MAJOR" REDIS_PLUS_PLUS_VERSION_MAJOR)

message.content: just need to add -DCMAKE_POLICY_VERSION_MINIMUM=3.5 to the build opts

content.text: I'll add the `-DCMAKE_POLICY_VERSION_MINIMUM=3.5` flag to the redis-plus-plus build options.

file.content:
# Redis++ library for bytecode cache
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.22)

include(FetchContent)

FetchContent_Declare(
  redis-plus-plus
  GIT_REPOSITORY https://github.com/sewenew/redis-plus-plus.git
  GIT_TAG 1.3.14
)

# Configure redis-plus-plus options
set(REDIS_PLUS_PLUS_BUILD_TEST OFF CACHE BOOL "Disable redis++ tests")
set(REDIS_PLUS_PLUS_BUILD_STATIC ON CACHE BOOL "Build redis++ static library")
set(REDIS_PLUS_PLUS_BUILD_SHARED OFF CACHE BOOL "Disable redis++ shared library")
set(REDIS_PLUS_PLUS_CXX_STANDARD 17 CACHE STRING "C++ standard for redis++")

# Disable exceptions in redis++
add_compile_definitions(REDIS_PLUS_PLUS_NO_EXCEPTIONS)

FetchContent_MakeAvailable(redis-plus-plus)

# Create an alias for easier linking
if(TARGET redis++_static)
  add_library(redis-plus-plus::redis++ ALIAS redis++_static)
elseif(TARGET redis++)
  add_library(redis-plus-plus::redis++ ALIAS redis++)
endif()

toolUseResult.originalFile:
# Redis++ library for bytecode cache
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.22)

include(FetchContent)

FetchContent_Declare(
  redis-plus-plus
  GIT_REPOSITORY https://github.com/sewenew/redis-plus-plus.git
  GIT_TAG 1.3.14
)

# Configure redis-plus-plus options
set(REDIS_PLUS_PLUS_BUILD_TEST OFF CACHE BOOL "Disable redis++ tests")
set(REDIS_PLUS_PLUS_BUILD_STATIC ON CACHE BOOL "Build redis++ static library")
set(REDIS_PLUS_PLUS_BUILD_SHARED OFF CACHE BOOL "Disable redis++ shared library")
set(REDIS_PLUS_PLUS_CXX_STANDARD 17 CACHE STRING "C++ standard for redis++")

# Disable exceptions in redis++
add_compile_definitions(REDIS_PLUS_PLUS_NO_EXCEPTIONS)

FetchContent_MakeAvailable(redis-plus-plus)

# Create an alias for easier linking
if(TARGET redis++_static)
  add_library(redis-plus-plus::redis++ ALIAS redis++_static)
elseif(TARGET redis++)
  add_library(redis-plus-plus::redis++ ALIAS redis++)
endif()
